name: Rottweiler Dog Life Simulator
description:
Do you have what it takes to train and care a Rottweiler ?
Are you thinking about getting a Rottweiler puppy? Try this game and see what is it about to have a Rottweiler dog. You can run, eat, overcome obstacle sets, collect coins or even scare people in the city park : )
You must react properly and be in time with the quests. Learn and Train Rottweiler temperament, but don't forget to feed your dog (tip: can be found near bins).

Key Features:

- Beautiful 3D graphics (city park scene with ambiance)

- Lot of funny dog behaviors (sitting, walking, running, jumping and more)

- Different quests (collect coins, overcome obstacles)

- 3 Game Scenes (city park, racing track, huge city)

- For any ages!
